pr_title: Add Spanish language to Lens UI

timeline.message:
chore: add chinese fields

todo by chinese contributors
feat: add languages to common components

timeline.bodyText: @tacigar @anuraaga hope you can give me a hand with these ones :)
timeline.author: jeqo

timeline.bodyText: Did you copy in the English strings here? It's better to leave empty string (should be what the extract messages tool did) which falls back to the default which is English. Otherwise it's harder to know what strings are pending translation.
timeline.author: anuraaga
jcchavezs
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,32 @@
+{
+  "src.components.App.changeLanguage": "Cambiar Idioma",

timeline.bodyText: I realized you must have manually set up the translation files - sorry for not documenting this command yet! I will do so but after addressing some current plans I have for the i18n setup.
timeline.author: anuraaga
